lead_paragraph: The quiet Colts receiver MARVIN HARRISON has not exceeded 100 yards in a game this season or had any touchdown dances featured on YouTube. Of course, in a career spent at the center of the N.F.L.’s most exciting offense, Harrison has always been anything but exciting.
